title: Introducing: Shy Guy
content:
Covering Slowdive on your debut EP is a surefire way of getting me to fall head over heels in love with your music.

Shy Guy, a four piece out of Nashville, comprised of Taylor Lowrance, Brennan Walsh, Hutch Crowley and Ben Crannell are set to release a five track EP on 5 July, but have made it available for streaming ahead of time. A wonderfully assured first outing, Dreams showcases immense songwriting talent, and a real togetherness. Be it the languid pop-gem Off and On, or the lovingly downtrodden romance of Losing, not to mention a more than worthwhile cover of Slowdive’s Alison, it’s a welcome introduction to a group overflowing with potential.

Check out the EP in full below, and keep up with the group via Facebook.
